title: 8/28/23 Senate Study Committee on Certificate of Need Reform
summary:

Key Actions: No specific bills were mentioned as being passed or referred.

Bills Introduced (First Reading): None detected.

- The session opened with a prayer led by Senator Robertson.
- Remarks were provided by Senate Rules Committee Chairman Richard Smith and Representative Carolyn Hugley, who discussed the healthcare challenges facing Georgia and the need to address CON reform.
- The committee heard from Mark Baker about the facility hosting the meeting and its history in supporting medical education.

Votes: No recorded votes were mentioned.

Attendance: No specific quorum notes were provided.

Adjournment: The transcript does not indicate when the session was adjourned or the date of the next scheduled meeting.
